option.value: Only voice notification, not missed calls
MWI notification for voicemail and missed calls

device.deviceconfig:
<?xml version="1.0"?> <settings> <time_date> <date_format>%%datestyle%%</date_format> <hr24_clock>%%timestyle%%</hr24_clock> <ntp_dhcp_option>0</ntp_dhcp_option> <ntp_server>1</ntp_server>
